languages.text: {n}Кибермастиф вонзает клыки в предплечье скомороха и яростно мотает мордой. Всего мгновение — и пес выпускает изорванную руку из хватки. Вскрикнув от боли, Блеф отшатывается и удирает прочь, растворившись в волнующемся море толпы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибермастиф вонзает клыки в предплечье скомороха и яростно мотает мордой. Всего мгновение — и пес выпускает изорванную руку из хватки. Вскрикнув от боли, Блеф отшатывается и удирает прочь, растворившись в волнующемся море толпы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кибермастиф вонзает клыки в предплечье скомороха и яростно мотает мордой. Всего мгновение — и пес выпускает изорванную руку из хватки. Вскрикнув от боли, Блеф отшатывается и удирает прочь, растворившись в волнующемся море толпы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff sinks its teeth into Bluff's arm and shakes it furiously. A moment later, Glaito lets go, leaving his arm in tatters. Crying out in pain, Bluff jumps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff sinks its teeth into Bluff's arm and shakes it furiously. A moment later, Glaito lets go, leaving his arm in tatters. Crying out in pain, Bluff jumps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

{n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's wrist, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's arm is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

{n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's wrist, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's arm is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

{n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

{n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你还没来得及眨眼，他身边的生化獒犬就将尖牙刺入了闹闹的前臂，愤怒地撕咬着。攻击仅仅持续了一会儿，但当格雷托松口时，小丑的胳膊已经被撕成了碎片。闹闹高声惨叫，跳开了，融入了骚乱的人群之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你还没来得及眨眼，他身边的生化獒犬就将尖牙刺入了闹闹的前臂，愤怒地撕咬着。攻击仅仅持续了一会儿，但当格雷托松口时，小丑的胳膊已经被撕成了碎片。闹闹高声惨叫，跳开了，融入了骚乱的人群之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}まばたきする間もなく、彼の傍らにいたサイバーマスチフがブラフの前腕に噛みつき、怒り狂って激しく引き裂くように揺さぶった。攻撃はほんの一瞬で終わったが、グライトが放したときには、道化の腕はすでにズタズタに引き裂かれていた。ブラフは悲鳴を上げながら、跳ねるようにその場を離れ、うねる群衆の中へと姿を消した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まばたきする間もなく、彼の傍らにいたサイバーマスチフがブラフの前腕に噛みつき、怒り狂って激しく引き裂くように揺さぶった。攻撃はほんの一瞬で終わったが、グライトが放したときには、道化の腕はすでにズタズタに引き裂かれていた。ブラフは悲鳴を上げながら、跳ねるようにその場を離れ、うねる群衆の中へと姿を消した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes de que tengas ocasión de pestañear siquiera, el cibermastín hunde los colmillos en el antebrazo de Farol y lo zarandea furiosamente. El ataque dura tan solo un instante, pero cuando Glaito suelta al bufón, su extremidad ya ha quedado mutilada. Con un alarido de dolor, Farol se aleja de un brinco y se pierde entre la agolpada muchedumbre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que tengas ocasión de pestañear siquiera, el cibermastín hunde los colmillos en el antebrazo de Farol y lo zarandea furiosamente. El ataque dura tan solo un instante, pero cuando Glaito suelta al bufón, su extremidad ya ha quedado mutilada. Con un alarido de dolor, Farol se aleja de un brinco y se pierde entre la agolpada muchedumbre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sen daha gözünü kırpamadan yanındaki siber mastif, dişlerini Kurusıkı'nın ön koluna geçirip öfkeyle ileri geri sallıyor. Saldırı bir an sürse de Glaito bıraktığında soytarının kolu çoktan lime lime olmuş. Acı çığlığı koparan Kurusıkı, yana kaçıp kaynayan kalabalığın içinde kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen daha gözünü kırpamadan yanındaki siber mastif, dişlerini Kurusıkı'nın ön koluna geçirip öfkeyle ileri geri sallıyor. Saldırı bir an sürse de Glaito bıraktığında soytarının kolu çoktan lime lime olmuş. Acı çığlığı koparan Kurusıkı, yana kaçıp kaynayan kalabalığın içinde kayboluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En un éclair, le cyber-mastiff plante ses crocs dans l'avant-bras de Bluff et le secoue avec férocité. L'attaque ne dure qu'un instant, mais elle suffit à déchiqueter le membre du bouffon lorsque Glaito le relâche. Hurlant de douleur, Bluff bondit hors de portée et se fond dans la foule agitée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un éclair, le cyber-mastiff plante ses crocs dans l'avant-bras de Bluff et le secoue avec férocité. L'attaque ne dure qu'un instant, mais elle suffit à déchiqueter le membre du bouffon lorsque Glaito le relâche. Hurlant de douleur, Bluff bondit hors de portée et se fond dans la foule agitée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bevor du zwinkern kannst, schlägt der Cyber-Mastiff seine Zähne in Bluffs Unterarm und schüttelt ihn wütend. Der Angriff dauert nur wenige Augenblicke, aber als Glaito von Bluff ablässt, ist der Arm des Narren bereits zerfetzt. Mit einem Schmerzensschrei weicht Bluff zurück und verschwindet in der Menge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you can even blink, the cyber-mastiff beside him sinks its teeth into Bluff's forearm, jerking it back and forth in a fury. The attack lasts only for a moment, but when Glaito lets go, the fool's limb is already torn to shreds. With a cry of pain, Bluff leaps away and melds into the roiling crowd.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bevor du zwinkern kannst, schlägt der Cyber-Mastiff seine Zähne in Bluffs Unterarm und schüttelt ihn wütend. Der Angriff dauert nur wenige Augenblicke, aber als Glaito von Bluff ablässt, ist der Arm des Narren bereits zerfetzt. Mit einem Schmerzensschrei weicht Bluff zurück und verschwindet in der Menge.{/n}
